channel.title: 637 dementhium how can i disable high xp?
channel.description: I like private servers and all but i dont like how when you kill 1 person you lvl up 20 freakin lvls so i got my own server so now that i have the client and server running is there any way to disable high xp for the server to make it like the normal runescape xp system?
